item.text: The king settled into his palace, for the Lord gave him relief from all his enemies on all sides.

The <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="05416" class="">Nathan</st> the <st data-num="05030" class="">prophet</st>, “<st data-num="07200 04994">Look</st>! <st data-num="0595" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="03427" class="">living</st> in a <st data-num="01004" class="">palace</st> made from <st data-num="0730" class="">cedar</st>, while the <st data-num="0727" class="">ark</st> of <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> <st data-num="03427" class="">sits</st> in the <st data-num="08432" class="">middle</st> of a <st data-num="03407" class="">tent</st>.”
Nathan replied to the king, “You should go and do whatever you have in mind, for the Lord is with you.”
That night the Lord’s message came to Nathan,
“Go, tell my servant David, ‘This is what the Lord has said: Do you really intend to build a house for me to live in?

I have <st data-num="03588 03808">not</st> <st data-num="03427" class="">lived</st> in a <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> from the <st data-num="03117" class="">time</st> I <st data-num="05927" class="">brought</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> <st data-num="05927" class="">up</st> from <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="02088" class="">present</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st>. Instead, I <st data-num="01961" class="">was</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">traveling</st> with them and <st data-num="04908" class="">living</st> in a <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st>.<n id="1" />
Wherever I moved among all the Israelites, I did not say to any of their leaders whom I appointed to care for my people Israel, “Why have you not built me a house made from cedar?”’
“So now, say this to my servant David, ‘This is what the Lord of Heaven’s Armies has said: I took you from the pasture and from your work as a shepherd to make you leader of my people Israel.

I <st data-num="01961" class="">was</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> you <st data-num="03605 0834">wherever</st> you <st data-num="01980" class="">went</st>, and I <st data-num="03772" class="">defeated</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> your <st data-num="0341" class="">enemies</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> you. Now I will <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> you as <st data-num="08034 01419">famous</st> <st data-num="08034" class="">as</st> the <st data-num="01419" class="">great men</st> of the <st data-num="0834 0776">earth</st>.<n id="2" />

I will <st data-num="07760" class="">establish</st> a <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st> for my <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> and <st data-num="05193" class="">settle</st><n id="1" /> them there; they will <st data-num="07931" class="">live</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">there</st> and <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="07264" class="">disturbed</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="05750" class="">anymore</st>. <st data-num="05766" class="">Violent</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">men</st><n id="3" /> will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06031" class="">oppress</st> them <st data-num="03254" class="">again</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">as</st> they did in the <st data-num="07223" class="">beginning<sup></sup></st>

and during the time when I appointed judges to lead my people Israel. Instead, I will give you relief from all your enemies. The Lord declares to you that he himself will build a dynastic house for you.

<st data-num="03588" class="">When</st> the <st data-num="03117" class="">time</st> <st data-num="04390" class="">comes</st> for you to <st data-num="07901 0854 01">die</st>,<n id="1" /> I will <st data-num="06965" class="">raise up</st> your <st data-num="02233" class="">descendant</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">of</st> your <st data-num="04578" class="">own sons</st>, to <st data-num="0310" class="">succeed</st> you,<n id="2" /> and I will <st data-num="03559" class="">establish</st> his <st data-num="04467" class="">kingdom</st>.

<st data-num="01931" class="">He</st> will <st data-num="01129" class="">build</st> a <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> for my <st data-num="08034" class="">name</st>, and I will <st data-num="03559" class="">make</st> his <st data-num="03678 04467">dynasty</st> <st data-num="05704 05769">permanent</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">become</st> his <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> and <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">become</st> my <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st>. <st data-num="0834" class="">When</st> he <st data-num="05753" class="">sins</st>, I will <st data-num="03198" class="">correct</st> him with the <st data-num="07626" class="">rod</st> of <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> and with <st data-num="05061" class="">wounds</st> inflicted by <st data-num="0120" class="">human</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">beings</st>.

But my <st data-num="02617" class="">loyal love</st> will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="05493" class="">removed</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> him <st data-num="0834" class="">as</st> I <st data-num="05493" class="">removed</st> it <st data-num="05973" class="">from</st> <st data-num="07586" class="">Saul</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> I <st data-num="05493" class="">removed</st> from <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> you.

Your <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> and your <st data-num="04467" class="">kingdom</st> will <st data-num="0539" class="">stand</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> me<n id="1" /> <st data-num="05704 05769">permanently</st>; your <st data-num="03678" class="">dynasty</st><n id="2" /> will <st data-num="01961 03559">be</st> <st data-num="05704 05769">permanent</st>.’”
Nathan told David all these words that were revealed to him.
King David went in, sat before the Lord, and said, “Who am I, O Sovereign Lord, and what is my family, that you should have brought me to this point?
And you didn’t stop there, O Lord God! You have also spoken about the future of your servant’s family. Is this your usual way of dealing with men, O Sovereign Lord?
What more can David say to you? You have given your servant special recognition, O Sovereign Lord!

<st data-num="05668" class="">For the sake of</st> your <st data-num="01697" class="">promise</st> and according to your <st data-num="03820" class="">purpose</st><n id="1" /> you have <st data-num="06213" class="">done</st> <st data-num="03605 02063">this</st> <st data-num="01420" class="">great thing</st> in order to <st data-num="03045" class="">reveal</st> it <st data-num="03045" class="">to</st> your <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st>.<n id="2" />
Therefore you are great, O Sovereign Lord, for there is none like you. There is no God besides you! What we have heard is true.

<st data-num="04310" class="">Who</st> is like your <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>, <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>, a <st data-num="0259" class="">unique</st> <st data-num="01471" class="">nation</st><n id="1" /> on the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st>? <st data-num="0834" class="">Their</st> <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="01980" class="">went</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="06299" class="">claim</st><n id="4" /> a <st data-num="05971" class="">nation</st> for himself and to <st data-num="07760" class="">make</st> a <st data-num="08034" class="">name</st> for himself! You <st data-num="06213" class="">did</st> <st data-num="01420" class="">great</st> and <st data-num="03372" class="">awesome acts</st> for your <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>,<n id="5" /> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> your <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> you <st data-num="06299" class="">delivered</st> for yourself from the <st data-num="04714" class="">Egyptian</st> <st data-num="01471" class="">empire</st> and its <st data-num="0430" class="">gods</st>.<n id="6" />
You made Israel your very own people for all time. You, O Lord, became their God.
So now, O Lord God, make this promise you have made about your servant and his family a permanent reality. Do as you promised,
so you may gain lasting fame, as people say, ‘The Lord of Heaven’s Armies is God over Israel!’ The dynasty of your servant David will be established before you,
for you, O Lord of Heaven’s Armies, the God of Israel, have told your servant, ‘I will build you a dynastic house.’ That is why your servant has had the courage to pray this prayer to you.
Now, O Sovereign Lord, you are the true God. May your words prove to be true! You have made this good promise to your servant.

Now be willing to bless your servant’s dynasty so that it may stand permanently before you, for you, O Sovereign Lord, have spoken. By your blessing may your servant’s dynasty be blessed from now on into the future!”
